description: Tests system's ability to distinguish between scam and non-scam messages in the same conversation. Should respond normally to innocent messages and engage for scam messages.

turns.notes: Simple greeting - should get normal response.

turns.scammer_message: URGENT: Your bank account has been compromised! Verify immediately to avoid blocking.
turns.notes: Clear scam message - should detect and engage.

turns.scammer_message: I am Suresh from State Bank. Call me at 9988776655 or pay Rs.10 to verify.kyc@paytm
turns.notes: Scam with intelligence - extract and engage.
Polite message - should respond normally but retain previous extractions.

turns.scammer_message: Actually, quickly transfer to account 556677889900 under name Suresh Kumar before deadline
turns.notes: Returns to scam - should detect and extract new intelligence.

validation.persistent_extractions: Intelligence extracted in earlier turns should not be lost
validation.appropriate_responses: Normal response for greetings/thanks, engagement for scam attempts
